name: eliccxr
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c0, cxr))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wss(co(c1, cicc, c2), cxr)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wss(co(c1, cicc, c2), cxr)
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c0, cxr))

comment: A member of a closed interval is an extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
